LanguageData.LingTurret_CrazyMortarCrash.label: Giant cannons falling from the sky
LanguageData.LingTurret_CrazyMortarCrash.letterText: Bang! A mortar has landed on your base, and you can take possession and use it, or disassemble it into resources.
LanguageData.LingTurret_CrazyMortarCrash.letterLabel: Giant cannons falling from the sky
